guidance.des1001: The demons are too powerful; our only option left is to use the Relic!
guidance.des1002: Dorabella, cast the Relic skill now, while I'm defending!
guidance.des1003: This situation is worse than I thought!
guidance.des1011: Get ready to fight! Send these evil <color=#ffa352>Demons</color> back to the <color=#ffa352>Abyss</color>!
guidance.des1023: Stand behind me Omniguardian, I'll cover you!
guidance.des1041: Remember to <color=#c05100>enhance</color> yourself before fighting strong enemies. Always be at your best. That's the warrior's code.
guidance.des1042: Odysseus, your power is the key to our victory.
guidance.des1043: You should try increasing your <color=#c05100>level</color> first.
guidance.des1044: Gear can aid you in combat. Tap <color=#c05100>Equip All</color>.
guidance.des1045: Excellent! Now, let us return to the battlefield!
guidance.des1071: The longer you fight, the more spoils you'll get!
guidance.des1072: With these resources, we can become even stronger!
guidance.des1073: Omniguardian, use these resources to enhance <color=#ffa352>Jerald</color>'s power!
guidance.des1074: After <color=#ffa352>leveling up</color>, he will become stronger.
guidance.des1076: The remaining resources can be used to <color=#ffa352>level up</color> other heroes.
guidance.des1171: Ugh! Without the Valkyries... we can't defeat the Demons!
guidance.des1172: I vow to protect the innocent! I... will never surrender!
guidance.des1173: Excellent! Let your death welcome the arrival of the dark era.
guidance.des1081: The <color=#ffa352>Demon queen</color> is just ahead. Hurry! I have a bad feeling about this...
guidance.des1101: The Demon army has been defeated! I must guide the <color=#ffa352>Valkyries</color> back to the <color=#ffa352>Imperial City</color>.
guidance.des1102: It's dangerous outside of Mirlond. Let's find another hero to join us.
guidance.des1103: We're here. Tap here to start summoning!
guidance.des1201: A new hero has joined our team. She will be a powerful ally.
guidance.des1202: We should enhance this hero before we head into battle.
guidance.des1204: Tap here to quickly <color=#c05100>increase her level</color>!
guidance.des1205: Leveling complete! Enhance the other <color=#c05100>heroes</color> if you still have resources remaining.
guidance.des1400: Enhancement complete! Let's discuss our next steps.
guidance.des1401: Complete Mission 2-12 to find the <color=#ffa352>Essence Elixir</color> to heal Eluller!
guidance.des1601: Deploy our newly joined hero and crush these enemies!
guidance.des1701: Open the <color=#ffa352>Wilderness Map</color> to observe your surroundings.
guidance.des1702: The Imperial <color=#ffa352>Arena</color> is nearby. Let's have a look!
guidance.des1703: Select one opponent to battle against! Show these arrogant fools our strength!
guidance.des1901: <color=#ffa352>Idle Speed-up</color> activated. Let's have a good time!
guidance.des1902: <color=#ffa352>Idle Speed-up</color> can earn you resources useful for increasing our team's power.
guidance.des2001: The <color=#ffa352>Gear Enhancement</color> function is now available. Now, enhance your team!
guidance.des2002: Enhancing gear can significantly improve their stats.
guidance.des2003: Enhance this piece of gear first!
guidance.des2004: We still have a lot of Gold. Use it to level up your gear!
guidance.des2005: Don't forget, other types of gear can also be enhanced.
guidance.des2006: Now it's all up to you! Let's get stronger!
guidance.des2201: Enhancement complete. Even the most menacing of enemies are no match for us!
guidance.des2202: Now, let's give the enemy a taste of our might!
guidance.des2301: Complete the <color=#ffa352>Bounty Quests</color> to earn generous rewards.
guidance.des2302: We can use the <color=#c05100>Intel Points</color> obtained to accept Bounty Quests.
guidance.des2303: Let's check the Intel Points on this quest first.
guidance.des2304: Complete this Bounty Quest to claim its reward.
guidance.des2305: Select heroes who meet the <color=#c05100>Star</color> and <color=#c05100>Faction</color> requirements before starting a Bounty Quest.
guidance.des2306: Tap here to quickly select heroes that fulfill the quest's requirements.
guidance.des2307: The heroes are ready. Let's start the Bounty Quest!
guidance.des2308: <color=#c05100>Wait</color> for the heroes to win. We can claim quest rewards upon their triumph!
guidance.des2309: <color=#ffa352>Bounty Quests</color> are on the noticeboard. Accept and complete them to obtain generous rewards!
guidance.des2401: Look! We found a mysterious underground palace deep inside <color=#ffa352>Palace of Penrose</color>.
guidance.des2402: A powerful evil aura is emanating from within the <color=#ffa352>Palace of Penrose</color>. Let's check it out!
guidance.des2601: Use the <color=#ffa352>Ascension Ores</color> obtained from the <color=#ffa352>Palace of Penrose</color> to ascend our heroes.
guidance.des2602: Choose our strongest hero and <color=#ffa352>ascend</color> them, thereby increasing their power even further!
guidance.des2701: Use the remaining <color=#ffa352>Ascension Ores</color> on your favorite heroes!
guidance.des2801: I've heard that the City is establishing <color=#ffa352>guilds</color>.
guidance.des2802: Join a guild to get even more Intel.
guidance.des2901: Enter the Wilderness. The gates of the <color=#ffa352>Forgotten Land</color> have opened!
guidance.des2902: We can enter the <color=#ffa352>Forgotten Land</color> and gain lots of useful resources daily.
guidance.des2904: Defeat the monsters in the <color=#ffa352>Wailing Mines</color> to get lots of Gold for leveling up our heroes.
guidance.des2905: Complete the <color=#ffa352>3-Star</color> objectives to claim additional rewards.
guidance.des2906: Choose our strongest team and start the trial!
guidance.des3001: Pray to the Goddess at the <color=#ffa352>Oracle Temple</color> to get a <color=#ffa352>specific faction</color>'s heroes.
guidance.des3002: Here we can summon a <color=#c05100>4 to 5-Star</color> Hero or Hero Shards of <color=#c05100>any selected Faction</color>.
guidance.des3003: Choose a favorite faction to summon from!
guidance.des3101: Rumor has it that many treasures are buried in the Volcano <color=#ffa352>Labyrinth</color>.
guidance.des3102: In the deepest part of the <color=#c05100>Labyrinth</color>, powerful monsters guard a <color=#c05100>Relic</color> forged by Surtr the Fire God.
guidance.des3103: <color=#c05100>We</color> are here now. Keep moving to reach our objective.
guidance.des3104: Defeat the monsters and head for the <color=#ffa352>Relic</color> in the bottom!
guidance.des3106: To use the Relic in battle, we must deploy it first.
guidance.des3107: Let's see the Relic's might in this battle!
guidance.des3011: The doors to the <color=#ffa352>Relic Vault</color> have been opened for the <color=#ffa352>Omniguardian</color>.
guidance.des3012: Use <color=#ffa352>Invoker Crystals</color> in the Relic Vault to summon powerful <color=#ffa352>Relics</color>.
guidance.des3013: Tap here to summon <color=#ffa352>Relics</color> and strengthen your team!
guidance.des3021: We now have a <color=#ffa352>Relic</color>. Let's enhance it!
guidance.des3023: Use <color=#ffa352>Refined Dust</color> to increase a <color=#ffa352>Relic</color>'s level.
guidance.des3024: Tap here to quickly increase the <color=#ffa352>Relic level</color>!
guidance.des3201: Once <color=#ffa352>Relic Energy</color> reaches a threshold, the Relic Skill is cast automatically.
guidance.des3202: Relic Energy grows each round. <color=#ffa352>Killing enemy units</color> can greatly boost Relic Energy.
guidance.des3203: After the Relic Skill is cast, there is a <color=#ffa352>cooldown</color> for a few rounds before it can be used again.
guidance.des3301: <color=#ffa352>Gear Refinement</color> can provide huge boosts to Heroes.
guidance.des3306: You can use <color=#ffa352>Refinement Ore</color> to refine gear.
guidance.des3307: The <color=#c05100>Refinement Level</color> of the Gear will increase once the <color=#c05100>Refinement Progress</color> bar is full.
guidance.des3308: Once certain Refinement Levels are reached, special <color=#c05100>Stat Bonuses</color> are granted.
guidance.des3309: Use Refinement Ores to increase the Refinement Level.
guidance.des3310: Remember, all Gear can be refined.
guidance.des3401: The <color=#ffa352>Legend Archive</color> is now open. Go and take a look.
guidance.des3402: The Legend Archive records famed deeds of the land's heroes.
guidance.des3404: Let's find out about this hero's story.
guidance.des3405: Read this legend from its very beginning here.
guidance.des3501: All elite enemies encountered in stories are recorded here.
guidance.des3502: Defeat Elite Enemies for chance to get their Hero Shards.
guidance.des3503: The number of Trial attempts per day is limited.
guidance.des3504: Let's fight! We'll try our hand with this enemy first!
guidance.des3602: Earn Runes by defeating enemies in the Celestial Trials.
guidance.des3605: Choose Elite Enemies' corresponding <color=#ffa352>affix</color> before challenge.
guidance.des3606: Selected affix changes increase enemy difficulty.
guidance.des3607: Let's try an easy affix first.
guidance.des3608: Affixes increase the <color=#c05100>stars</color> of Elite Enemies. Get rewards by defeating Elite Enemies with a specified number of stars.
guidance.des3610: Elite Enemies with higher stars grant more rewards.
guidance.des3701: We got some <color=#ffa352>Runes</color> from the fight just now. Go equip them.
guidance.des3705: Each slot can contain Rune of the corresponding position.
guidance.des3711: You can upgrade your Runes to make them stronger.
guidance.des3713: Leveling up Runes can significantly increase their stat bonuses.
guidance.des3716: Enhance Runes to increase stats effects. Higher-quality Runes have higher Max Enhancement levels.
guidance.des3801: It's said that far into this land lies the <color=#ffa352>Gloomwoods</color>.
guidance.des3802: Countless <color=#ffa352>Vileflowers</color> that crystallize magic into <color=#ffa352>Terra Crystals</color> grow in the Gloomwoods.
guidance.des3804: The <color=#ffa352>Vileflower</color> craves sustenance. Try feeding these offerings to it!
guidance.des3811: Different foods give Vileflowers different levels of Satiation.
guidance.des3814: <color=#c05100>Vileflowers</color> will evolve to a higher quality, but they will degrade if Satiation exceeds 21 points.
guidance.des3815: <color=#ffa352>Feed</color> it one more offering for the best results!
guidance.des3816: Since the Vileflower has reached its highest quality, you can stop feeding it.
guidance.des3817: You can harvest magic <color=#c05100>Terra Crystals</color> from it after a while.
guidance.des3905: <color=#ffa352>Equip Gems</color> for a huge boost in your heroes' Combat Power!
guidance.des1611: <color=#c05100>Support heroes</color> can join some battles. Deploy them to make the battles significantly easier.
guidance.des2220: Get the <color=#ffa352>Spring of Vitality</color> at the <color=#ffa352>Valkyric Guardianship</color> to heal Eluller.
guidance.des2221: Complete the designated quests to activate the <color=#ffa352>Valkyric Guardianship</color>.
guidance.des2222: Activate the <color=#ffa352>Valkyric Guardianship</color> to obtain its corresponding <color=#ffa352>rewards</color>.
guidance.des3818: Feeding successful! Now, we can <color=#ffa352>speed up</color> the harvest once.
guidance.des3831: We obtained a lot of <color=#ffa352>Gems</color>. Let's use these extra <color=#ffa352>Gems</color> to <color=#ffa352>craft</color> the best ones.
guidance.des3834: Select <color=#ffa352>Gems</color> of identical quality to start <color=#ffa352>crafting</color>.
guidance.des1052: I can provide <color=#ffa352>Healing</color> and <color=#ffa352>buffs</color>! I won't hold you back!
guidance.des1062: I can help too! Deploy me in battle!
guidance.des1063: Tap the Synergy icon to view details of the Synergy effects.
guidance.des1064: Eluller and I can apply a Shield on the ally team at the start of the battle and support them in battle!
guidance.des1602: The Faction Bonus has been activated.
guidance.des1603: Deploying multiple heroes from the <color=#ffa352>same faction</color> activates Faction Bonus, which provides stat bonuses for the <color=#ffa352>whole team</color>.
guidance.des3031: <color=#ffa352>Hero Conversions</color> can be performed at <color=#ffa352>Flashback Tower</color>.
guidance.des3032: This is the portal for <color=#ffa352>Hero Conversions</color>.
guidance.des3033: Select a hero to initiate the conversion.
guidance.des3121: Heroes' health can be restored when they cannot fight anymore.
guidance.des3122: Using the Revival Statue <color=#c05100>revives</color> <color=#c05100>all</color> fallen heroes and restores <color=#c05100>100% HP</color> to all heroes.
guidance.des4001: <color=#ffa352>Rune Blessings</color> are now available. Let's try it out.
guidance.des4002: Let's use it on our strongest hero first.
guidance.des4007: Use the <color=#ffa352>Grail of Blessing</color> to bless the Runes.
guidance.des4008: Each blessing increases 1 of the 3 base stats. When all 3 stats' blessings are maxed out, the blessing level will increase.
guidance.des4009: When blessings reach a specific level, additional stat bonuses will be unlocked.
guidance.des4010: Blessings can provide tremendous stat boosts, so try to increase the <color=#ffa352>Blessing Levels</color> of your Runes as much as possible.
guidance.des2812: <color=#ffa352>Sanctuary of Eve</color> has a Benediction feature that quickly levels up non-main heroes
guidance.des4101: <color=#c05100>Relic Ascension</color> is now available. We can now further enhance <color=#c05100>Relics</color>.
guidance.des4102: Let's choose the strongest <color=#c05100>Relic</color> we have.
guidance.des4104: Use the <color=#c05100>Spirit of Forging</color> to <color=#c05100>forge Relics</color>.
guidance.des4105: Each time you forge, a specific stat will be increased. Ascension becomes available after forging 6 times.
guidance.des4106: After ascending a Relic, you can activate its ascension talent, increasing the Relic's skill effects and the stats of the entire team.
guidance.des4107: Certain <color=#c05100>Relic forging</color> requirements must be fulfilled in order to perform <color=#c05100>Relic Ascension</color> again.
guidance.des1077: Tap here to quickly <color=#ffa352>increase the level</color>.
guidance.des2224: As the <color=#ffa352>Valkyric Guardianship</color> increases, the Omniguardian will also be able to evolve further.
guidance.des3512: We can get a lot of Hero Shards in the Lost City.
guidance.des3513: Let's begin by fighting this enemy!
guidance.des3514: You can claim rewards when your Star rating is high enough.
guidance.des3515: Get all 3 Stars to claim all rewards.
guidance.des3517: This will help us quickly deploy heroes who meet the Star requirements.
guidance.des3518: Now it's all up to you! Go forth and claim victory!
guidance.des3523: Let's choose this piece of gear.
guidance.des3524: We can enter the enchantment area from here.
guidance.des3525: Enchant Crystals are required to increase enchantment levels.
guidance.des3526: Once fully-equipped gear are enchanted to a certain level, you can activate additional bonuses.
guidance.des3527: Now try enchanting a second piece of gear.
guidance.des3528: Now it's all up to you! Let's get stronger!
guidance.des5001: Trial quest completed. You can <color=#ffa352>evolve</color> your <color=#ffa352>Valkyric Guardianship</color> now!
guidance.des5002: This trial has been completed. We can claim its reward now.
guidance.des5006: We've finished this phase's trials. It's time to <color=#ffa352>evolve</color>.
guidance.des5007: <color=#c05100>Evolution</color> complete. Complete the newest trial to enhance your <color=#c05100>Valkyric Guardianship</color>!
guidance.des4301: There is news from the Woodland. The Gloomwoods <color=#ffa352>Pillage Mode</color> is now available.
guidance.des4302: Now we can feed the second <color=#ffa352>Vileflower</color> to harvest more <color=#ffa352>Terra Crystals</color>.
guidance.des2310: If there are no quests that interest you, try refreshing to receive more <color=#ffa352>worthwhile quests</color>.
guidance.des2111: Tap here to quickly enhance all of your gear.
guidance.des2711: A new event has started. Let's check it out!
guidance.des2321: Quick, bring Eluller back to the Valkyrie Manor in Mirlond!
guidance.des2322: This is the <color=#ffa352>Valkyrie Manor</color>. We must heal her as soon as possible!
guidance.des2324: Let's come back here once we figure out a solution!
guidance.des2325: Eluller welcomes you and your Favor increases. Note that there is a daily touch limit.
guidance.des3131: This must be the <color=#ffa352>Soul Altar</color> that seals monsters. Let's take a closer look!
guidance.des3132: The <color=#c05100>Soul Altar</color> offers many types of powerful <color=#c05100>buffs</color>.
guidance.des3133: Come, pick a <color=#ffa352>buff</color> that is most suited to our team. Break the <color=#ffa352>Soul Altar</color>'s seal!
guidance.des3141: Tap here to view <color=#ffa352>Exploration Achievements</color> for the <color=#ffa352>Labyrinth</color>.
guidance.des3142: <color=#c05100>Exploration Achievements</color> are listed here, each achievement has generous rewards.
guidance.des3143: <color=#ffa352>Exploration Achievements</color> are listed here, each achievement has generous rewards.
guidance.des3144: Continue to explore the Labyrinth and complete <color=#ffa352>Achievements</color> to claim all of their rewards!
guidance.des3151: Battle start! Defeat the <color=#ffa352>Vault Guardian</color> and take the treasure!
guidance.des2404: Deploy heroes with the same synergy to activate different <color=#c05100>Synergy effects</color> on every floor.
guidance.des2405: Let's select and deploy this hero first.
guidance.des2406: Now, select heroes who have synergy with him to activate the <color=#ffa352>special synergy effects</color>!
guidance.des2407: It's time to fight! Let's wipe these evildoers out!
guidance.des4311: The <color=#ffa352>Wish List</color> function is now available. Let's check it out!
guidance.des4312: Select 2 heroes to put into your <color=#c05100>Wish List</color>. The heroes get a higher chance to be summoned.
guidance.des4313: Tap here to set your <color=#ffa352>favorite heroes</color>!
guidance.des4314: You have finished setting up your <color=#ffa352>Wish List</color>! Go summon your favorite heroes now!
guidance.des4321: The <color=#ffa352>Gem Purification</color> function has been unlocked!
guidance.des4322: Tap on the Gems you currently have equipped here.
guidance.des4324: <color=#c05100>Gem Purification</color> allows a Gem's initial stats to be replaced with a new set of random stats.
guidance.des4325: If there are secondary stats that you'd like to retain, you can choose to <color=#c05100>lock the stats</color> before <color=#c05100>purifying</color> them.
guidance.des4326: Remember to purify your Gems regularly to equip them with your favorite <color=#ffa352>stats</color>!
guidance.des4331: When crafting Gems of Uncommon quality or higher, you can select <color=#ffa352>stats to inherit</color>.
guidance.des4332: Select a <color=#c05100>designated number of stats</color> from the following. The Gem will inherit the selected stats after crafting is complete.
guidance.des6001: <color=#ffa352>Yggdrasil Supremacy Coliseums</color> have been unlocked! Go check the <color=#ffa352>Wilderness</color>!
guidance.des6004: Let's head to the lowest coliseum floor firstâ€”the <color=#ffa352>Helheim</color>!
guidance.des6005: This is the entrance to the <color=#ffa352>Helheim</color>.
guidance.des6006: Select this enemy and <color=#ffa352>challenge them</color>! We shall rise to the top for sure!
guidance.des3539: Now it's all up to you! Let's get stronger!
guidance.des3540: There is a chance to trigger Lucky Strike, which means you only spend the resources required for one node and directly reach the node before a major node.
guidance.des3541: Now, try enchanting again to see if you trigger Lucky Strike.
guidance.des2326: You found some interesting things on your adventure. Let's give them to Eluller!
guidance.des2327: Since you've unlocked Eluller's biography, let's learn about Eluller's past together!
guidance.des2328: You can obtain Favor Gifts from Mission Idling. Continue increasing your Favor to unlock more Eluller stories and other functions.
guidance.des5105: We can go to the Gem function screen from here.
guidance.des5107: A Gem's upgrade level is shown from top to bottom. Each time it is upgraded, some energy will be added to its progress bar.
guidance.des5108: Let's choose a Gem and try it out!
guidance.des5109: We can activate this Gem to obtain some stats.
guidance.des5110: You can activate <color=#c05100>Synergy</color> by leveling both Gems to <color=#c05100>Rare quality</color> and advancing the hero to <color=#c05100>8-Star</color>.
guidance.des5111: You can activate a <color=#c05100>Gem-exclusive skill</color> by leveling both Gems to <color=#c05100>Epic quality</color>.
guidance.des5112: Continue to level up Gems in order to obtain more stat bonuses!
guidance.des6201: It's said that far into this land lies the <color=#ffa352>Gloomwoods</color>.
guidance.des6202: Countless <color=#ffa352>Vileflowers</color> that turn magic into <color=#ffa352>Terra Crystals</color> grow in the Gloomwoods.
guidance.des6203: You can feed the Vileflowers that you grow in the Foggy Jungle to harvest <color=#ffa352>Terra Crystals</color>.
guidance.des6204: Your Vileflowerbed is located in the middle. Let me go in and feed it.
guidance.des6205: The <color=#ffa352>Vileflower</color> craves sustenance. Try feeding these offerings to it!
guidance.des6301: Different foods give Vileflowers different levels of Satiation.
guidance.des6304: <color=#c05100>Vileflowers</color> will evolve to a higher quality, but they will degrade if Satiation exceeds 21 points.
guidance.des6305: <color=#ffa352>Feed</color> it one more offering for the best results!
guidance.des6306: Since the Vileflower has reached its highest quality, you can stop feeding it.
guidance.des6307: You can harvest magic <color=#c05100>Terra Crystals</color> from it after a while.
guidance.des6308: Feeding successful! Now, we can <color=#ffa352>speed up</color> the harvest once.
guidance.des6309: We can harvest the <color=#ffa352>Terra Crystals</color> now!
guidance.des6401: You can now increase your <color=#ffa352>Gloomwoods Level</color>!
guidance.des6402: Increase your Gloomwoods Level to harvest more resources when you plant flowers!
guidance.des6403: You can increase your Gloomwoods Level to <color=#c05100>auto-claim</color> a one-time reward!
guidance.des6404: Level up to unlock <color=#ffa352>high-quality Vileflowerbeds and Terra</color>!
guidance.des6501: You can assist other players' Vileflowers while they are being gathered.
guidance.des6503: The higher the player's Gloomwoods and Vileflowers are, the more rewards you'll get!
guidance.des3706: This Rune contains great power. Let's choose it.
guidance.des3707: Equip Runes of the same type to activate the Set effect.
guidance.des3731: Equip 4 <color=#c05100>Rare</color> or higher Runes and advance the hero to <color=#c05100>8-Star</color> to unlock a new <color=#c05100>Synergy</color>.
guidance.des2329: Clear more Missions to meet more Valkyries. Onward!
guidance.des4553: We can go to the Hero Talents interface from here.
guidance.des4554: Each hero can grow <color=#c05100>2 branches of Talents</color>.
guidance.des4555: Each time a talent is upgraded, some energy will be added to its progress bar.
guidance.des4556: Let's choose a talent and try it out!
guidance.des4557: We can activate this talent to obtain some stats.
guidance.des4558: Level up talent branches to <color=#c05100>Rare</color> and advance the hero to <color=#c05100>7 stars</color> to unlock a new <color=#c05100>Synergy</color>.
guidance.des4559: Level up both talent branches to <color=#c05100>Epic</color> quality to unlock <color=#c05100>Talent-exclusive Skill</color>.
guidance.des4560: Continue to level up Talents in order to obtain more stat bonuses!
guidance.des7001: We can enter the realm from here.
guidance.des7002: This is the chapter our guild is tackling.
guidance.des7003: Tap the boss to see monster details.
guidance.des7004: You can view the best <color=#ffa352>Synergy</color> for fighting this boss here.
guidance.des7005: Deploy the right heroes to gain their Synergy effects!
guidance.des7006: Take a look back at the main challenge interface.
guidance.des7007: After killing the boss, <color=#ffa352>all guild members</color> can claim a chest reward!
guidance.des8002: The growth level of <color=#c05100>Trailblazer's Legacy</color> is limiting the max growth of the 6 branches.
guidance.des8003: There are skills here suited for various Synergies.
guidance.des8004: Every 10 levels of <color=#c05100>Trailblazer's Legacy</color> gained will increase the max growth level of the branches.
guidance.des8101: A higher level of guild skills can greatly increase the combat abilities of synergymates!
guidance.des8102: Get <color=#c05100>Savvy Points</color> from leveling up Legacy branches and use them to activate the skills above.
guidance.des8104: This is our total Savvy Points. Use it to activate guild skills.
guidance.des8105: Here are the skills that can be activated for use in battle.
guidance.des8106: Tap here to view Skill overviews!
guidance.des8107: Each branch's <color=#c05100>final skill effect</color> will be displayed here.
guidance.des8108: Tap the buttons on the left and right to quickly view other Synergies' final skill effects!
guidance.des8109: The skills affect all heroes but grant different buffs to different synergymates. <color=#c05100>Choose wisely</color>!
guidance.des7201: Defeat Grayshroom Realm bosses to gain special buffs for <color=#c05100>all guild members</color>.
guidance.des7202: Get more special buffs to defeat the boss easily!
guidance.des7203: Check the Supreme Balance effect here!
guidance.des7204: Special buffs have a huge impact on DPS ability. Prioritize <color=#ffa352>teamwork and the boss attack order</color>!
guidance.des9002: Defeat enemies in the Celestial Trials for <color=#ffa352>Runes</color>.
guidance.des9003: Different Runes drop from different bosses. Higher floors drop higher quality Runes!
guidance.des9004: Let's select a boss to challenge!
guidance.des9011: Bosses have different bonus requirements! Let's take a look at <color=#ffa352>{0}</color> requirements!
guidance.des9012: Activate the <color=#c05100>{0}</color> bonus when you deploy <color=#c05100>{2}</color> <color=#c05100>{1}</color>!
guidance.des9072: Select a suitable <color=#c05100>blessing</color> to complete challenges easier!
guidance.des9075: You will gain a powerful bonus if your deployed heroes meet the specified <color=#c05100>Synergy requirements</color>!
guidance.des9111: Bosses from this floor onwards will have different <color=#ffa352>mercenaries</color>!
guidance.des9112: Deploy the <color=#c05100>recommended heroes</color> with the <color=#c05100>activated Rune skills</color> to counter them!
guidance.des6605: When there are <color=#c05100>more than 3 occupying guildmates</color>, you gain a <color=#c05100>yield bonus</color>!
guidance.des6608: You gain resources from Terras based on your <color=#c05100>occupation duration</color>!
guidance.des6609: Defeat <color=#c05100>players</color> to obtain their Terras, but your attempts are limited, so choose wisely!
guidance.des9006: Select a suitable <color=#ffa352>blessing</color> to complete challenges easier!
guidance.des9009: You will gain a powerful bonus if your deployed heroes meet the specified <color=#c05100>Synergy requirements</color>!
guidance.des6505: While we wait, let's go and <color=#ffa352>Assist</color> now!
guidance.des9171: Aiushtha and her friends have set up a 30-day <color=#ffa352>Goddess Trial</color>. Complete the trials to obtain the goddesses!
guidance.des9181: Tap the <color=#ffa352>Quest Tab</color> to open the quest list in the corresponding tab!
guidance.des9182: Complete the quest to claim <color=#ffa352>points and rewards</color>!
guidance.des9183: Return to the Main Page to check the details of your <color=#ffa352>current points</color>!
guidance.des9184: Collect points within 30 days of the new server to obtain the <color=#c05100>D/D Selectable Hero</color>!
guidance.des9191: We need more heroes to fight against the evil forces. The extra <color=#ffa352>teams</color> are now ready!
guidance.des9192: Tap the <color=#ffa352>Next Team button</color> to configure the lineup for the next team.
guidance.des9193: The situation is dire. I'll help you this time!
guidance.des9194: Deployed <color=#ffa352>Heroes and Relics</color> are not available for another lineup.
guidance.des9195: If you want to check the first team, tap the team number to quickly view it.
guidance.des9196: To clear this stage, <color=#ffa352>both teams must win</color>! Go and experience the dual team!
guidance.des9201: If you wish to quickly adjust the order of the two teams, long press the team area and drag to the corresponding position to make the change.
guidance.des9202: Close the page after adjusting to save the changes.
guidance.des9252: A new Hero Summon is now available. Go take a look.
guidance.des9253: Tap to enter the new Synergy Summon feature.
guidance.des9254: Tap here to switch between the different Synergy card pools.
guidance.des9255: There are a total of 6 Synergy card pools. Switch between them anytime.
guidance.des2331: Eluller has decided to stay with us. Let's pay her a visit.
guidance.des2332: It has been tough lately. Pat Eluller on the head to encourage her. Do not do anything else!
guidance.des2333: Eluller accepts you, and her Favor towards you increases. But there's a daily touch limit
guidance.des2334: You found some interesting things on your adventure. Let's give them to Eluller!
guidance.des2335: Increase Eluller's Favor to unlock more outfits.
guidance.des2336: You can change her outfit here.
guidance.des2337: Continue increasing Eluller's Favor in order to unlock more hidden stories and other features!
guidance.des2338: You can obtain Favor gifts from Idle Missions and save more Valkyries.
guidance.des2271: You can use Quick Battle in the Arena now.
guidance.des2272: Select Quick Battle here to see results without entering battle.
guidance.des1413: Let's go to the Starshard Valley!
guidance.des92602: Select <color=#c05100>Mythic Stone II</color> for a chance to get <color=#c05100>Legendary Relics</color> and <color=#c05100>lots of Forge Points</color>.
guidance.des92603: Select <color=#c05100>Mythic Stone I</color> for a chance to get <color=#c05100>Epic Relics</color> and <color=#c05100>some Forging Points</color>.
guidance.des92604: Next, select the forging resources to spend!
guidance.des9211: Special summoning method for Divine and Demon heroes to increase your chances
guidance.des9212: If you summon 10 times here, it will trigger the special status Super Chance, which greatly increases your chance to obtain a Legendary Hero.
guidance.des9222: The Super Chance status will ensure a far higher chance to obtain Legendary Heroes or specific heroes in Summon x10.
guidance.des9223: The Super Chance effect will only last until the next Summon x10 and has a time limit. Use it quickly!
guidance.des2911: Clear Stage 1 to unlock the Idle feature and earn rewards
guidance.des2912: Tap here to view and claim idle rewards. Let's have a look.
guidance.des2913: View idle rewards and duration here. Try not to exceed the limit!
guidance.des2914: Here's a welcome gift. Tap to claim your first idle reward!
guidance.des1421: The <color=#ffa352>Valkyrie Eluller</color> has been abducted by Arkdina!
guidance.des1422: Clear specific Missions to help Valkyries in need!
guidance.des1423: There's no time to waste. Let's move out now!
guidance.des6007: You need <color=#c05100>2 defensive teams</color> for Yggdrasil Supremacy. Go set them up now!
guidance.des6008: Fight up to 3 battles using 2 teams in Yggdrasil Supremacy. <color=#c05100>The first to win 2 battles will be the winner</color>!
guidance.des6009: Start setting up your <color=#c05100>two defensive teams</color> now!
guidance.des6101: Use 2 teams to fight 3 times. <color=#c05100>The first to win 2 battles will be the winner</color>!
guidance.des6102: Start setting up your <color=#c05100>two offensive teams</color> now!
guidance.des2421: The <color=#c05100>Collection Room</color> is ready! Let's check out Eluller's gift!
guidance.des2422: Level up your <color=#c05100>Manor</color> to get powerful collectibles!
guidance.des3112: We recommend using Relics in this order: <color=@82>Recovery-> Explosive-> Chrono</color>.
guidance.des2341: The <color=#ffa352>Collection Room</color> is ready! Let's check out Eluller's gift!
guidance.des2342: Level up your <color=#ffa352>Manor</color> to get powerful collectibles!
guidance.des6121: Every season features Synergy Blessings. <color=#c05100>Activate the specified Synergy group and deploy them</color> to claim the bonuses!
guidance.des92701: Congratulations! You have Archives that can be activated. Go check them out!
guidance.des92702: The Synergy Archives are sorted by Hero Synergies. Let's check out the Valkyrie Synergies first!
guidance.des92703: Tap the icon for more Synergy details including name, stats, and other info!
guidance.des92704: When Archives are available for activation, tap them to activate them!
guidance.des92705: Whoa, you got lots of stats! Remember, they're permanent!
guidance.des92706: To find out about more upgrades, tap the Hero again!
guidance.des92707: That concludes this tutorial. Work hard to activate all Archives!
guidance.des93001: When Heroes reach the maximum stars, their duplicates become excess Heroes, who can be used for Hero Conversion.
guidance.des93002: Tap here to view all the Heroes you could obtain from conversion.
guidance.des93003: Excess Heroes will be shown below. Each conversion costs 3 excess E/W/E or D/D Heroes.
guidance.des93004: After selecting Heroes, tap here to view the Heroes that could be obtained from conversion.
guidance.des9311: The <color=#ffa352>Rift Odyssey</color> has been unlocked! Let's go and take a look in the <color=#ffa352>Wilderness</color>!
guidance.des9312: The hero stats will be <color=#ffa352>balanced</color> in the <color=#ffa352>Northern Expedition</color>. Check the Help section for more info.
guidance.des93201: More evil forces have emerged in the Palace of Penrose. We need more heroes to fight them. The extra <color=#ffa352>teams</color> are now ready!
guidance.des93301: More evil forces have emerged in the Palace of Penrose. We need more heroes to fight them. The extra <color=#ffa352>teams</color> are now ready!
guidance.des2741: A new event has started. Let's check it out!
guidance.des2744: You can summon a hero by entering that brightest summoning gateway.
guidance.des2121: Go back to Valkyrie Manor and see how Eluller's injury is going.
guidance.des2122: Let's find a way to heal Eluller's wounds!
guidance.des16001: Send me into battle; I can fight alongside Jerald and activate the Synergy.
guidance.des16002: Tap the Synergy icon to view details of the Synergy effects.
guidance.des16003: The "Valiantors" synergy has been activated! Jerald and I will increase our PDMG.
guidance.des16004: The Synergy has been activated! Let's get ready to battle!
guidance.des90021: I'm ready. Deploy me to join the fight.
guidance.des90031: Let me stand in the frontline and face the enemy.
guidance.des28301: After joining a guild, you can claim Guild Chests.
guidance.des28303: Send the chest to the guild.
guidance.des28304: All guild members can claim the chests and receive random Diamond rewards.
guidance.des28305: Show your gratitude by giving some flowers to the sender!
guidance.des2713: Let's see what trials have for us!
guidance.des6131: Find an opponent and start a challenge!
guidance.des94501: Let's take a look at the Eternal Level!
guidance.des94502: There are quests completed. Simply tap "Claim All."
guidance.des94505: Complete more quests to gain EXP and increase your Eternal Level!
guidance.des94506: After leveling up your Eternal Level, you can claim item rewards.
guidance.des95001: Now, let's explore the Chaotic Space.
guidance.des95002: We can enter the Chaotic Space from here.
guidance.des95003: Currently, we can only explore this difficulty level. Let's get in!
guidance.des95101: Clearing stages will increase your exploration progress.
guidance.des95102: Each cleared stage boosts the drop rate of Marks in other stages.
guidance.des95301: We've cleared a stage, so now we can sweep it.
guidance.des95302: We can sweep the highest stage that we've already cleared.
guidance.des95303: Each sweep uses Chaotic Crystals, you can recover 1 every 45 minutes.
guidance.des96001: <color=#ffa352>Eternal Ritual</color> activated. Once the season ends, it will disappear.
guidance.des96002: Tap the slider below to switch to <color=@000088>Spells</color>.
guidance.des96003: Counter Water Spell enemies with the <color=@000088>Wind Spell</color>.
guidance.des96004: This way, we counter the enemies' Spell.
guidance.des96102: Select the Spell where the Arcane is located.
guidance.des96201: The enemies are using the <color=@000088>Fire Spell</color>, which counters our <color=@000088>Wind Spell</color>
guidance.des96202: Tap the slider below to switch to <color=@000088>Spells</color>.
guidance.des96203: Switch to the <color=@000088>Water Spell</color> to counter the enemies.
guidance.des96204: In the next stages, you'll need to change the Spells to counter enemies
guidance.des96301: Tap the slider below to switch to <color=@000088>Spells</color>.
guidance.des96302: Enemies are using <color=@000083>Common</color> Spells. We need <color=@000088>higher-quality</color> spells to counter.
guidance.des96303: <color=@000088>Higher-quality</color> spells will drop in the <color=@000088>Chaotic Space</color>
guidance.des94001: The season has begun. Let's check it out!
guidance.des94101: In the Shattered Realm, power differs from Mirlond.
guidance.des94103: <color=@000083>Blessed heroes</color> will display even greater strength in the Tome of Itheron
guidance.des97001: The hero has unlocked the new <color=@000083>Awakening</color> feature!
guidance.des97002: Activate all 6 stages to awaken the synergy!
guidance.des97003: Activate the Lightseeker synergy and boost your stats!
guidance.des100001: You can activate the brand-new <color=@000083>Season Synergies</color> now!!!
guidance.des100002: Tap to return to the Season interface
guidance.des100004: Select the hero you want to activate the synergy for
guidance.des99001: Welcome to Clash Domain, let me show you around!
guidance.des99003: Tap on the quest and see what we need to do!
guidance.des99004: If you haven't decided on a team, you can try the Dispatch All!
guidance.des99005: Conquer territories, and earn points by defeating enemies!
guidance.des99007: Fortresses yield more points, expand your territory after capturing them.
guidance.des95601: From this difficulty onwards, the boss will possess additional skills.
guidance.des95602: The boss's extra skills are extremely dangerous.
guidance.des95701: The oath recall rewards have been updated, let's check it out!
guidance.des95702: Use diamonds for Immortal Summons. Get the current hero in your 1st 50 <color=@000083>Summons</color>!
guidance.des95703: Get 100/200 summons in this event, to get an <color=@000083>extra</color> selectable UP hero card!
guidance.des99101: Clash Domain introduces the guild builder function. Let's take a look.
guidance.des99102: Each guild has 4 buildings. The <color=@000083>Royal City</color> generates grid points.
guidance.des99103: Select the building to view its current status
guidance.des99105: When members donate enough, the building upgrades automatically, boosting production.
guidance.des95801: You've obtained an artifact. Try its effect.
guidance.des95802: To use the artifact in battle, we need to deploy it first.
guidance.des95803: The total cost of deployed artifacts must not exceed the limit.
guidance.des95804: Here you can see the effects of all the deployed artifacts.
guidance.des99102_2: 3 <color=@000083>Workshops</color> produce resources for all members each round.
guidance.des95903: Take a look at the Insignias obtained by guild members!
guidance.des95901: Each type of Guild Merit provides different bonuses to all members.
guidance.des95902: The value of the bonuses is determined by acquiring the top 5 highest quality insignias for the guild.
guidance.des100101: Let's take a look at this team's season synergies.
guidance.des100103: When the season synergies <color=@000083>Enigmas</color> or <color=@000083>Souleaters</color> are equal in number to other season synergies, they will take effect first!
guidance.des96401: Clear the specified difficulty level in the Chaotic Space to exchange for Resonance Tokens
guidance.des96403: Every Resonance Token can <color=@000083>increase the cost limit of deployed Artifacts</color>
guidance.des96501: The cost limit of deployed Artifacts can be increased using Resonance Tokens
guidance.des96503: Exchange Resonance Token in the shop.
guidance.des97101: The World Arena has begun, check it out!
guidance.des97102: Sign up for a match now.
guidance.des97105: Win enough matches to beat your opponents.
guidance.des97201: Rank up for more defense teams.
guidance.des97202: In Platinum tier, we'll engage in 5v5 battles.
guidance.des97301: Rank up to set up more defense teams.
guidance.des97302: In Challenger tier, we'll engage in 7v7 battles.
guidance.des97401: In Platinum tier, the battle order will be randomized.
guidance.des97402: You can view all the opponent's defenses.
guidance.des99201: Tap the Locator to view the invading monsters' information.
guidance.des99301: Defeat the corresponding monsters to earn Artifact rewards. If the monsters are not defeated when the countdown ends, the Royal City will be attacked and enter a Damaged state.
guidance.des97501: Mulan has many rewards for you. Spin to be the lucky star!
guidance.des97502: Each spin costs 1 Launch Firework Tube. Complete Launch Quests to earn more.
guidance.des97503: Choose a lantern to light up and earn more rewards.
guidance.des97504: The lanterns you obtain will be stored here. Be sure to collect them daily!
guidance.des81101: This season, the Dragon's Nest joins the guild. Check it out!
guidance.des81102: As the season progresses, the guild can unlock evolving dragons.
guidance.des81103: As the Royal City levels up, all dragons will level up.
guidance.des81201: The dragonling has reached a level where it can evolve!
guidance.des81202: Pick a unique evolution form for your dragonling.
guidance.des81203: Evolved dragons acquire unique skills, with each dragon having its own abilities
guidance.des81204: Select a dragon you like and evolve it!
guidance.des81301: In each Dragon War, our guild faces off against another guild.
guidance.des81302: Attack the opponent's dragons; higher progress wins.
guidance.des81401: We have gathered enough energy to summon a giant dragon for an attack.
guidance.des81403: Pick a grid occupied by another guild and summon the giant dragon to attack.
guidance.des81404: Now it's all up to you! Secure an advantage for our guild!
guidance.des97602: In Challenger tier, we'll engage in 9v9 battles.
guidance.des82101_01: You can activate the brand-new <color=@000083>Hope Tree</color> now!!!
guidance.des82101_02: Tap to return to the Season interface
guidance.des82101_03: Tap to open the <color=@000083>Hope Tree</color> interface
guidance.des82101: This is the main interface of the Hope Tree
guidance.des82103: Tap here to level up the Hope Tree
guidance.des82104: Increasing the Hope Tree's level enhances all heroes' stats and Power during the season
guidance.des82105: For every 10 levels increased, you will receive additional resources to enhance various effects for your teams in battle.
guidance.des82106: Prioritize upgrading your favorite lineup positions!
guidance.des82201: Each lineup position has 6 skills that can be enhanced
guidance.des82202: Some skills need to be activated in order
guidance.des82203: The effects of the two skill paths differ, but only one can be activated. Choose the one that suits you best!
guidance.des82301: Each Season Synergy has 7 Hope Tree Skills that can be enhanced
guidance.des82302: Explore which effects work best for you and focus on upgrading those!
guidance.des82401: Leveling up skills here will provide various bonuses in the corresponding season modes!
guidance.des82402: Explore which effects work best for you and focus on upgrading those!
guidance.des82503: Each boss in the Seraphic Ruins drops different Artifacts
guidance.des82601: Challenging a boss will reduce its HP
guidance.des82602: Once you reduce the boss's health by a certain amount, you can earn progress rewards.
guidance.des82603: Each challenge consumes Light Energy, which recovers over time.
guidance.des82604: Give it a try and challenge a boss!
guidance.des82701: High-level bosses have special traits, so deal with them carefully.
guidance.des82702: Check the boss information and think about your strategy!
guidance.des101001:
You can activate the brand-new <color=@000083>Season Synergies</color> now!!!
Tap to return to the Season interface
guidance.des101002:
You can activate the brand-new <color=@000083>Season Synergies</color> now!!!
Tap to return to the Season interface
guidance.des101004: Some heroes in the new season have new Season Synergies that need to be activated with items.
guidance.des98001: In the Treasure Recovery event, players can complete stages to earn rewards.
guidance.des98002: Use Mysterious Starfish to reveal the squares within a stage and discover hidden treasures.
guidance.des98003: Find all the treasures to complete a stage.
guidance.des98004: Once the stage is completed, you will receive the rewards.
guidance.des98005: Mysterious Starfish can be obtained from Treasure Quests.
guidance.des101101: You have obtained a higher-quality Benedicted Hero. You can <color=@000083>replace a Contracted Hero</color>.
guidance.des82801: This season, the reset rules for the Hope Tree have changed!
guidance.des82803: During the first 7 days of the season, you can reset for free as many times as you want. Find the perfect upgrade path for yourself!
guidance.des82901: Alchemy Fountains have been discovered in Clash Domain. Let's check them out!
guidance.des82903: View the basic info of your Alchemy Fountains here.
guidance.des82904: Tap here to go to the fountain.
guidance.des82905: Challenge the Guardian Boss to increase the progress.
guidance.des83001: View your Alchemy Fountain details here.
guidance.des83002: The Fountain Essence obtained from the Alchemy Fountains can be used to enhance Clash Techs.
guidance.des83003: Select the tech you want to level up.
guidance.des83004: Guild members can donate enough Fountain Essence to increase its level.
guidance.des83005: They'll also earn various rewards during the process.
guidance.des98101: In the Wavechaser Invite event, you will interact with Leviathan.
guidance.des98102: Giving different gifts to Leviathan will increase her Favor towards you.
guidance.des98103: As the Favor Level increases, you will receive generous rewards.
guidance.des98105: Materials for crafting gifts can be obtained through Summer Quests.
guidance.des98201: When Leviathan's mood changes, her preferred gift will also change.
guidance.des98202: Crafting her currently preferred gift will help increase her Favor Level more quickly.
guidance.des98203: Here, you can check how many more gifts need to be given before Leviathan's mood changes.
guidance.des98301: You will compete against rival guilds in the Tournament.
guidance.des98302: Sign up here to participate in the Tournament.
guidance.des98303: You can deploy multiple teams in the Tournament, matching the number of teams allowed in Clash Domain.
guidance.des98304: Teams can be freely adjusted before the battle begins, but no changes can be made once it starts.
guidance.des98401: We're approaching the heart of the swamp.
guidance.des97901: Tap to return to the Season interface
guidance.des97905: Fantastic! Our team has achieved victory!
guidance.des97906: Tap to return to the cleared gate
guidance.des97909: After a thorough search, we've obtained the treasure rewards. Tap to claim.
guidance.des97702: Let's check out the <color=@000083>Ancient Accessories</color> we've obtained!
guidance.des97703: All obtained Ancient Accessories are displayed here.
guidance.des97704: Go equip these accessories on our heroes.
guidance.des97705: <color=@000083>Contracted and Benedicted</color> Heroes of <color=@000083>Epic or Legendary</color> quality can equip accessories.
guidance.des97706: First, equip an accessory for a hero of this synergy.
guidance.des97707: Each hero can only equip accessories corresponding to their <color=@000083>synergy</color>.
guidance.des97708: Now, equip an accessory for a hero of this synergy.
guidance.des97709: Tap on a hero to individually adjust their accessories.
guidance.des97710: On the Details page, you can equip, replace, and remove accessories.
guidance.des97801: The hero has equipped an accessory that can be upgraded. Go upgrade it now.
guidance.des97802: You can <color=@000083>enhance and purify</color> the stats of accessories to upgrade them.
guidance.des98501: Control Lady Dorabella's <color=@000083>left and right movements</color>.
guidance.des98502: Monsters reaching the city walls will damage the forest. Pay attention to the <color=@000083>Forest HP</color>.
guidance.des98601: Breaking a treasure chest will drop 2 <color=@000083>effects</color>. Choose 1 to <color=@000083>accept</color> and enhance your abilities.
guidance.des102003: Tap here to view the Guide again.
guidance.des102005: Defeat monsters to explore the map.
guidance.des102101: Trade Event unlocked. Tap to enter.
guidance.des102102: Goods can be traded in the Primeval Realm. Here are the names and prices of goods.
guidance.des102103: Tap here to select the purchase quantity.
guidance.des102202: Master Event unlocked. Tap to enter.
guidance.des102203: Masters can help us learn skills from the Hope Tree.
guidance.des102204: Deliver the specified goods to the Master to complete your learning.
guidance.des102302: Tap here to check the goods anytime.
guidance.des102304: You can now select goods to sell.
